document.full_text: the elevator repair service theatrical troupe performs a mash-up of 'the great gatsby, ' 'the sound and the fury' and 'the sun also rises' at the stephen a. schwarzman building at the new york public library.
document.title: 3 classic novels. 22 minutes. why not?
lines_and_colors: the elevator repair service theatrical troupe performs a mash-up of 'the great gatsby, ' 'the sound and the fury' and 'the sun also rises' at the stephen a. schwarzman building at the new york public library.
